Articles.Content:
So Im testing my SSTO and got it landed, but when I load back KSP, he is still in orbit. So I try to get him back again but the SSTO crashed and Jeb was killed. K.I.A.ed!:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HLGjlWxNCAg I don't have any quick save that time.  I've heard the method to open file and respawn him but I don't know how to.  So PLEASE HELP ME AS SOON AS POSSIBLE PLEASE!!!!!!!! AND ALSO BOB WENT MISSING AND I CANT FIND HIM IN THE ASTRONUT COMPLEX, IT DOSENT EVEN SHOW THE M.I.A., HE WAS JUST GONE

 

Edited November 8, 2023 by Andrew1233
Forgot something

Go into your save's folder, there's another folder called Backup.  There will be five backups in there.  Take the newest one, and paste it up one level so it's in the save's main folder alongside your other saves, such as persistent.sfs.

You can then load the backup in-game like you would a quicksave.

8 minutes ago, Geonovast said:

Go into your save's folder, there's another folder called Backup.  There will be five backups in there.  Take the newest one, and paste it up one level so it's in the save's main folder alongside your other saves, such as persistent.sfs.

You can then load the backup in-game like you would a quicksave.

Thx, but how do I get into the file? (look dont get mad at me im just a  noob that knows how to get the laythe which is my biggest achievement)

10 minutes ago, Geonovast said:

Go into your save's folder, there's another folder called Backup.  There will be five backups in there.  Take the newest one, and paste it up one level so it's in the save's main folder alongside your other saves, such as persistent.sfs.

You can then load the backup in-game like you would a quicksave.

ALSO BOB WENT MISSING AND I CANT FIND HIM IN THE ASTRONUT COMPLEX, IT DOSENT EVEN SHOW THE M.I.A., HE WAS JUST GONE
By default, missing kerbals eventually respawn. Unless you are running custom settings, time should cure this problem

6 hours ago, Deddly said:

By default, missing kerbals eventually respawn. Unless you are running custom settings, time should cure this problem

But they are KIA, ive warped a whole year but he is still dead
